title: Privacy Policy
intro: We value your privacy. This page explains what personal data we collect when you contact us and how we use and protect it.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you contact us via the form or by email, we process your details to respond to your inquiry. Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, and restrict the processing of your personal data, as well as the right to data portability, where applicable. You can withdraw consent at any time for the future.
